entities.name: great hall
entities.description: The Great Hall is described as the location where the Sorting Hat finished and the students are gathered.

entities.name: sorting hat
entities.description: The Sorting Hat is a magical object that sings a different song every year to sort the students into their respective houses.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as one of the students who is clapping along with everyone else when the Sorting Hat finishes.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is mentioned as one of Harry's friends who comments on the Sorting Hat's song.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is described as the person unrolling a large scroll of parchment and explaining the sorting process to the first-year students.

entities.name: stewart ackerley
entities.description: Stewart Ackerley is mentioned as one of the first-year students who is sorted into Ravenclaw house by the Sorting Hat.

entities.name: cho chang
entities.description: Cho Chang is mentioned as the Ravenclaw Seeker who cheers Stewart Ackerley when he is sorted into Ravenclaw house.

relationships.description: The Sorting Hat sorts Stewart Ackerley into Ravenclaw house.
Professor McGonagall explains the sorting process to the first-year students.
